channel.title: CVE Feed for Supsystic -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Supsystic -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29921|2024-03-27T07:14:50.883Z -- Supsystic -- Photo Gallery by Supsystic
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Supsystic Photo Gallery by Supsystic allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Photo Gallery by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.15.16.

item.title: CVE-2024-32829|2024-04-26T10:59:48.442Z -- Supsystic -- Data Tables Generator by Supsystic
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Supsystic Data Tables Generator by Supsystic.This issue affects Data Tables Generator by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.10.31.

item.title: CVE-2024-32790|2024-05-17T08:18:30.453Z -- Supsystic -- Pricing Table by Supsystic
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in Supsystic Pricing Table by Supsystic allows Code Injection.This issue affects Pricing Table by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.9.12.

item.title: CVE-2024-32089|2024-04-15T09:06:00.779Z -- Supsystic -- Digital Publications by Supsystic
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Supsystic Digital Publications by Supsystic.This issue affects Digital Publications by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.7.7.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Supsystic Digital Publications by Supsystic.This issue affects Digital Publications by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.7.7.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Supsystic Slider by Supsystic allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Slider by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.8.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-30237|2024-03-28T04:43:07.688Z -- Supsystic -- Slider by Supsystic
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Supsystic Slider by Supsystic.This issue affects Slider by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.8.10.
